initial_message: 1 Paper accepted at SIBGRAPI 2021 STN PLAD: A Dataset for Multi-Size Power Line Assets Detection in High-Resolution UAV Images.
Invited talk at the 2021 China National EDUxIndustry summit. Title: Extended Reality (XR) research in Brazil: Opportunities through the lenses of EDUxIndustry collaboration.
1 Paper accepted at the CVPR2021 Workshop LatinX in CV (LXCV) Generalizable Multi-Camera 3D Pedestrian Detection.
Best Paper of my PhD student Kelvin Cunha at SIBGRAPI 2020 A Study on the Impact of Domain Randomization for Monocular Deep 6DoF Pose Estimation, congratulations Kelvin!
I will be Co-General Chair for ISMAR and SVR 2020.
message_after_date1: I am a Co-General Chair for ISMAR and SVR 2020.
message_after_date2: Co-General Chair for ISMAR and SVR 2020.
